{{also|授人以鱼不如授人以渔}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=授人以鱼不如授人以渔|type=1111111111}}

===Etymology===
Literally, "giving a person fish is not as good as giving a person (the technique of) fishing". The words for "fish" ({{zh-l|魚}}) and "fishing" ({{zh-l|漁}}) have been homophonic since Old Chinese, both derived from {{cog|sit-pro|*s-ŋja||fish}}.
